RelatedSentence: A grand jury in the Western District of Pennsylvania has indicted five Chinese military personnel for computer hacking , economic espionage and other offenses directed at six American victims in the US nuclear power , metals and solar products industries , the US Justice Department said Monday .

A grand jury in the Western District of Pennsylvania has indicted five Chinese military personnel for computer hacking , economic espionage and other offenses directed at six American victims in the US nuclear power , metals and solar products industries , the US Justice Department said Monday .

The indictment alleges the defendants conspired to hack into American entities , to maintain unauthorized access to their computers and to steal information from those entities that would be useful to their competitors in China , including state - owned enterprises ( SOEs ) .

In some cases , the conspirators allegedly stole trade secrets that would have been particularly beneficial to Chinese companies at the time they were stolen .

In other cases , the conspirators also stole sensitive , internal communications that would provide a competitor , or an adversary in litigation , with insight into the strategy and vulnerabilities of the American entity .

The indictment named Wang Dong , Sun Kailiang , Wen Xinyu , Huang Zhenyu , and Gu Chunhui as the alleged conspirators .

RelatedSentence: It said the defendants were officers in Unit 61398 of the Third Department of the Chinese People 's Liberation Army ( PLA ) .

The indictment alleged that Wang , Sun , and Wen , among others known and unknown to the grand jury , hacked or attempted to hack into US entities named in the indictment , while Huang and Gu supported their conspiracy by , among other things , managing infrastructure used for hacking .

This is a case alleging economic espionage by members of the Chinese military and represents the first ever charges against a state actor for this type of hacking , US Attorney General Eric Holder said in a statement .
